plot: Through exclusive interviews and archive footage, 'The Price of Kings' takes an in-depth look into the lengthy yet controversial political life of the current President of Israel, Shimon Peres.
title: The Price of Kings: Shimon Peres
plot_es: Through exclusive interviews and archive footage, 'The Price of Kings' takes an in-depth look into the lengthy yet controversial political life of the current President of Israel, Shimon Peres.
original_name: The Price of Kings: Shimon Peres
plot_en: Through exclusive interviews and archive footage, 'The Price of Kings' takes an in-depth look into the lengthy yet controversial political life of the current President of Israel, Shimon Peres.
